name: Mr. Hair and the Kitty Katakombs
overview: It's that time again when we're here to help our hero Mr Hair in this brand new Arcade Style Platformer/Puzzler. You'll be blasting baddies and solving puzzles as you go whizzing down waterfalls and transporting into magical whirlwinds in frantic search for your beloved pussy cats in the flooded Katakombs! Mrs Hair and the kids are preying for everyone's safe return.
